amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study of the efficiencies in leasing and rental costs at the CFTC.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in House Report 113-476 to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study of the efficiencies in leasing and rental costs at the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fincher amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Fincher.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fincher amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
